extracted_information: 该文章是ForrestCook.net上关于Potato Chat应用数字取证分析的博客文章。作者描述了他如何通过设置三个设备并模拟活动来研究Potato Chat。主要发现集中在应用的文件存储结构和数据库工件。他详细介绍了图片、视频、音频、文件和应用日志的存储路径、文件命名约定以及不同用户交互行为（如发送、查看）如何影响文件生成和修改。作者指出，尽管“秘密聊天”宣传端到端加密，但其他功能的情况未知。他提到一个关键数据库`tgdata.db`，其中包含未被现有工具解析的protobufs，并计划在后续文章中详细探讨数据库和.plist文件。文章还提到了不同平台（iOS vs. Android）在视频缩略图模糊处理上的差异。

observed_tables: users_v32 (contains auto-completed usernames even without interaction)

encryption_mentions.other_features: Encryption status unknown or not end-to-end

file_storage_locations: ~/Shared/AppGroup/<App GUID>/Documents/files/ (full-sized images, thumbnails, video thumbnails, animated GIFs, audio, files)

images: thumbnail-WxH-WxH.jpg (observed after viewing media in gallery mode)
image-remote-<image ID>image-gallery-<pixel resolution>.jpg (in ~/files/, linked to user interaction)
videos: ~/<video ID>/ (thumbnails, in ~/Documents/files/, for device uploads, different ID than video-local)
local<video ID>.mov (link to remote<video ID>.mov, in ~/Documents/video/)
animated_gifs: ~/<image ID>/ (contains both .mov and .gif extensions for the same file)
audio: file.mp3 (link to the audio file, generated after playback)

platform_differences.video_thumbnails: iOS blurs video thumbnails by default in group chats until watched; Android does not.

temporal_info.application_logs: Rolling cache of up to 31 logs (0-30), ordered by recency (0 is most recent).

geographical_data.group_creation: Groups can be geographically locked, only allowing participants from particular areas.
